etomica.potential

Class P2SoftSphericalTruncated

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.Potential
      • etomica.potential.Potential2
        • etomica.potential.Potential2SoftSpherical
          • etomica.potential.P2SoftSphericalTruncated
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPotential, IPotentialAtomic, Potential2Soft, Potential2Spherical, PotentialSoft, PotentialTruncated
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    P2SoftSphericalTruncatedShifted

    public class P2SoftSphericalTruncated
extends Potential2SoftSpherical
implements PotentialTruncated
    Wraps a soft-spherical potential to apply a truncation to it. Energy and its derivatives are set to zero at a specified cutoff. (No accounting is made of the infinite force existing at the cutoff point). Lrc potential is based on integration of energy from cutoff to infinity, assuming no pair correlations beyond the cutoff.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  P2SoftSphericalTruncated.P0Lrc
      Inner class that implements the long-range correction for this truncation scheme.
